trends: There have been no other sightings in Hopatcong
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdriving west on rt i-80 i observed seven ships in formation around lake hopatcong (i think it could have been something else near the lake). they remained stationary in a formation (obviously in communication with each other) two helicopters approached them from the east and then turned and went back on their course and disappeared. i observed this formation for approximately 35 minutes as i approached the lake from the east and watched them in a formation around the lake. two of the ships, which just looked like stars but way too close to the horizon soundless followed west right in front of my car - not sure of the distance at which they travelled in front but they maintained the same distance all along as if they were following my car although i sensed no foreboding or weird vibrations. they then seemed to disappear from view but just faded out \went out of phase in a shimmering kind of way. two cars next to me were also watching it and pointing and looking and actually looked at me because i opened my sunroof and slowed down so i could watch them. someone should check if anyone else makes a report also where the helicopters were from i saw no markings and i could clearly tell the difference between the ships and the helicopters because the ships hovered\remained fixed in a "geosynchronous" position whereas the helicopters were moving across the sky as well as making noise.
Summary: formation around lake hopatcong seven ships
